title: Mouse and keyboard
body: My mouse and keyboard will not register in game. i can get through champ select but as soon as i get in game i cant move i cant type i cant even press the esc button to leave game its like im watching everything happen while im afk in game. somone please help me i want to cry ive been playing this game since season two and its the only video game i play idk what to do ive tried redownloading the game ive tried a new mouse ive tried so much. it happened while in game idk if i hit a button but it wont let me do anything

replies.body:
Do me a favor and try manually resetting your config files for me. They might be corrupted or just not downloading correctly from the servers, and this is a pretty quick and easy step to try first!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
